tooltip.deepresonance.filter_material:
This material can be used in the purifier 
to purify the crystal liquid.
tooltip.deepresonance.liquid_injector:
Creative only item to inject 100mb 
of liquid crystal into a tank.
tooltip.deepresonance.tank.extended:
This tank can hold up to 16 buckets of liquid. 
It is also capable of mixing the characteristics 
of liquid crystal. 
Place a comparator next to this tank to detect 
how full the tank is
